title: Exponential Moving Average (EMA)
content:
# Exponential Moving Average (EMA)

The EMA places a greater weight and significance on the most recent data points. It reacts more significantly to recent price changes than a simple moving average (SMA).

## Calculation
`EMA_today = (Value_today * (Smoothing / (1 + Days))) + EMA_yesterday * (1 - (Smoothing / (1 + Days)))`

## Why use EMA?
*   Less lag than SMA.
*   Better for identifying short-term trend reversals.
code:
import pandas as pd

df = pd.DataFrame({'Close': [10, 11, 12, 14, 15, 14, 13]})

# Calculate 3-period EMA
# adjust=False calculates the recursive formula exactly
df['EMA_3'] = df['Close'].ewm(span=3, adjust=False).mean()

print(df)
